document_title: Testicular cancer: Signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Testicular cancer is a disease with a very high chance of successful treatment. However, the disease can still spread to other parts of the body. If one or both testicles are removed, a man's fertility may be affected. Therefore, before starting treatment, you should talk to your doctor about appropriate interventions to preserve your fertility.
subsection_title: ung thu tinh hoan.json. Complications of testicular cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu tinh hoan.json. Complications of testicular cancer
Testicular cancer is a disease with a very high chance of successful treatment. However, the disease can still spread to other parts of the body. If one or both testicles are removed, a man's fertility may be affected. Therefore, before starting treatment, you should talk to your doctor about appropriate interventions to preserve your fertility.
